## FileChooser.isMultiple() method

Whether file chooser allow for [multiple](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input/file#attr-multiple) file selection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isMultiple(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
